title: Justice Department Grant Supports Suffolk University Study of Gang Violence Reduction (Suffolk University)
text: ( Source : Suffolk University ) The National Institute of Justice , an agency of the U.S. Department of Justice , has granted two Suffolk University professors $286, 000 to evaluate the effectiveness of a gang-violence-reduction model in four
